title: Fitness Tracker
description: A fitness tracking app that allows users to log workouts, track progress, and set fitness goals. It includes features like step tracking, calorie counting, and workout routines.

title: Recipe Finder
description: An app that helps users find recipes based on the ingredients they have. Users can input ingredients, and the app will suggest relevant recipes with cooking instructions.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website that showcases your work, skills, and experience. The site includes sections for an about me page, projects, blog, and contact form.

title: E-commerce Store
description: An online store platform that allows users to browse products, add items to the cart, and complete purchases. It includes features like product categories, search, and user authentication.
